name: PJ Style Interactive eBook & Games w/ PJ the Purple Elephant
blurb: Interactive eBook, When I Grow Up: PJ Style, is a children\u2019s story & games designed to intrigue and engage kids\u2019 imagination.

rewards.reward: Thank you so much for the support.  You all are amazing!  PJ is so excited.

Fabulous PJ Games and your name listed in the Credits \u2013 \r\nThe Games created for the eBook will also be released seperately as a game package.  You will receive the great games and will also have your name listed in the credits of the game app.
PJ pdf -\r\nPJ, thanks for the interactive eBook, but I have a Kindle or other reader that is not supported by Game Salad.  Can you give me a link to download the pdf eBook.
PJ Interactive eBook - This is it.  This is what we want to build, something more than the average eBook.  Sorry, the price was set by the publisher.

When I Grow Up: P.J. Style; Paperback ---\r\nThis is the original paperback book.  Children love reading this book and are thrilled to find PJ\u2019s footprint on each page.  Price was set by the publisher.
When I Grow Up: P.J. Style; Audio \r\n\r\nThis is PJ in audio recorded by the publisher.  She has a great voice.  You can save postage and I can email you this 2.1 MB .m4a file

PJ and the Crazy Squirrels; Paperback\r\n\r\nThis is PJ\u2019s  second Book.  This is the only place in the world before Cyber Monday that this book will be available.  This is an estimated price which may go up depending on the publishers pricing, but I will hold this price. The book will be released, December 3, and will be mailed by December 5, so for those in the USA, it should arrive in time for Christmas.

When I Grow Up: P.J. Style \u2013 CD \r\n\r\nThis is PJ on CD.  It\u2019s a CD so you can play it as the Kids view the book.  It is the same beautiful voice used in the app.  The CD will need to be mailed.  Hence, the shipping increase.
When I Grow Up: P.J. Style; Hardback\r\n\r\nThe original in Hardback.  Same exciting content

Plum Combo #1 - PDF eBook Crazy ---------

This combines the PDF eBook and PJ's latest book.  You recieve:
1. When I Grow Up: P.J. Style -  PDF eBook (Download)
2. PJ and the Crazy Squirrels (paperback)
3. PJ Games App
4. Your name in the credits of the ebook and game app.

Purple Combo #1  - Interactive Crazy -------


This combines the PJ  interactive eBook with the Crazy Squirrels:
1. When I Grow Up: P.J. Style - Interactive eBook (App - IOS or Android)
2. PJ and the Crazy Squirrels (paperback)
3. PJ Games App
4. Your name in the credits of the ebook and game app.

Lilac Combo #1 - Literature Only -----


This combines the Books of PJ in book format only and have no digital content (for those that just love books):
1. When I Grow Up: P.J. Style (paperback)
2. PJ and the Crazy Squirrels (paperback)
3. Your name in the credits

Plum Combo #2 – Plum Crazy PDF and paperbacks  -------

This takes Plum Combo #1 and adds PJ in paperback:
1. When I Grow Up: P.J. Style - PDF eBook (Downloadable)
2. PJ and the Crazy Squirrels  (paperback)
3. PJ Games App
4. When I Grow Up: P.J. Style  (paperback)
5. Your name in the credits of the ebook and game app.

Purple Combo #2  - Interactive Crazy and PJ Paperback -------


This takes Purple Combo #1 and adds PJ in paperback:
1. When I Grow Up: P.J. Style - Interactive eBook (App - IOS or Android)
2. PJ and the Crazy Squirrels (paperback)
3. PJ Games App
4. When I Grow Up: P.J. Style – (paperback)
5. Your name in the credits of the ebook and game app.

Lilac Combo #2 - Literature Only Too -----


This takes Lilac Combo #1 and Swaps a hardback for the paperback.  Again, no digital content (for those that just love books):
1. When I Grow Up: P.J. Style (hardback)
2. PJ and the Crazy Squirrels (paperback)
3. Your name in the credits

Plum Combo #3 – Plum Crazy about autographs  --


This takes Plum Combo #1 and adds PJ in hardback instead of paperback.  It includes:
1. When I Grow Up: P.J. Style - PDF eBook (Downloadable)
2. When I Grow Up: P.J. Style – (hardback-Autographed Copy)
3. PJ and the Crazy Squirrels (paperback-Autographed Copy)
4. PJ Games App
5. Your name in the credits of the ebook and game app.

Purple Combo #3  - Interactive Crazy about autographs -------


This takes Purple Combo #1 and adds PJ in in hardback instead of paperback:  It includes
1. When I Grow Up: P.J. Style - Interactive eBook (App - IOS or Android)
2. When I Grow Up: P.J. Style – (hardback-Autographed Copy)
3. PJ and the Crazy Squirrels (paperback-Autographed Copy)
4. PJ Games App
5. Your name in the credits of the ebook and game app.

Lilac Combo #3 - Literature with a CD Too -----


This takes Lilac Combo #2 and adds the audio CD (for those that just love books and CDs too):
1. When I Grow Up: P.J. Style (hardback - Autographed Copy)
2. PJ and the Crazy Squirrels (paperback - Autographed Copy)
3. When I Grow Up: P.J. Style; Audio CD
4. Your name in the credits
